title: Kicked Out: Part II
description: It was only supposed to be an experiment. How did things get so out of control?When Spaulding goes to stay with Ender over winter break, their bond profoundly deepens. But the handsome sports hero has a dark side that Spaulding knows he shouldn't like. So why can't he keep his hands off Ender...let alone his heart? As the ice thaws at Napier Academy, new secrets come to light, and Spaulding bares himself in ways he never could've predicted. Will it be enough to quench Ender's insatiable desire?
author: Michael Wapshot
